title: O_O
body: Why is Mecha Zero Sion fighting Mecha Malphite?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=evLfcywf,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-29T00:15:07.970+0000)
>
> Why is Mecha Zero Sion fighting Mecha Malphite?

One team picked Sion, the other team picked Malphite. They both had Mecha skins.

Or one team picked Sion AND Malphite, both wanting to go Top and now they are fighting. They both own Mecha skins, so at least they look cool.

Mecha Skins have their own Lore. Something about Mecha Sion Skin is unstable.
Hence the teaser was trying to shutdown Sion but was hacked and reactivated and said "targets acquired" and showed pictures of the other Mech Skins.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-preview/reactivating

Looking into it more, looks like someone hacked in and turned Sion on before he was ready and made him fight the other mechs. Maybe something to do with "Program Lissandra" and "Program Soraka" ?

> "Program Lissandra: the perfect A.I, she does not tolerate imperfection. One wrong move and she'll entomb you in a digital prison! 

Most likely Liss gone crazy and getting rid of the "inferior" mechs
or its like final boss and arcade, program is the equivalent to final boss and mecha arcade
